data.text: @sajidjavid How about the right to have a GP that actually answers the phone, is not scared to see patients in person and provides appointments with a day or two. Isn’t that what GPs used to do?
@RobEdwards7 @sajidjavid Oh love this. Well thought out more please
@MBrunelWalker @sajidjavid Agree I sat by a https://t.co/6MHp2YYMIR the Queen Elizabeth hos and when the computer went to standby it was running W95.

@sajidjavid The measures suggested by yourself amount to new #austerity measures, the true cost always falls on the poorest and most vulnerable.
The #UN condemned the previous Tory government's for their actions, this will be the same.

@sajidjavid CHOICE so NO more coercion is being vaccinated then???.., go back to work in a back.. you lot are all the same... USELESS

@KateNolton @mstlklncs @sajidjavid Yes because people spending other peoples money on services they don’t use always strive for the best quality & value for money!

Public money is wasted by the billions by people who have no care about either!

@sajidjavid You’ve got some brass neck. A friend of mine is off work - and on morphine. She was refused a GP appointment. They asked her to send a photo of her swollen, red hand. Apparently, it didn’t look so bad, in black & white. Eventually, she had to go to casualty.
@sajidjavid You’re the same prick who tried to fire 100k health workers and collapse the NhS yea? https://t.co/MAdyjGmh5l
